description: A comprehensive course covering the fundamentals of database management systems.

topics.title: Introduction to DBMS
topics.content: Overview of database systems, their purpose, and advantages.

subtopics.title: Database Users
subtopics.content: Different types of users and their roles.

topics.title: Relational Model
topics.content: Understanding the relational model and its components.

subtopics.title: Relational Algebra
subtopics.content: Basic operations like selection, projection, join, etc.

topics.title: SQL
topics.content: Structured Query Language for database interaction.

topics.title: Database Design
topics.content: Principles of database design and normalization.

topics.title: NoSQL Databases
topics.content: Introduction to NoSQL databases and their types.
